snippet: The New York Times invited Brawley Chisholm to call LeBron James’s first game back in Cleveland in his own inimitable style, offering a playground-level perspective on the biggest show in sports.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times invited Brawley Chisholm to call LeBron James’s first game back in Cleveland in his own inimitable style, offering a playground-level perspective on the biggest show in sports.

headline.seo: LeBron James’s Return to Cleveland, With Playground Play-by-Play by Big Brawley
headline.main: Whip Whap Whoops! Knicks Spoil LeBron’s Homecoming
